name: Glitched Tower
description:
Glitch  your way through the platforms to get to the top of the tower. Use the glitch finder to find the locations of glitched platforms.

Controls:

WASD or Arrow Keys: Move and Climb
Space: Jump
R: Return to previous checkpoint
T: Create Checkpoint
F: Use Glitch Finder

[Hint] Halfway up the tower you would need to go down a shaft. There is an invisible platform to land on, on the right.
